column1: Empowerment: Three group sessions (breast cancer education; communication; volunteerism) 1.5 hours 3 times across 3 weeks
Education: Three group sessions (breast cancer education; diet; physical activity) 1.5 hours 3 times across 3 weeks
Residence in Pilsen, Little Village, East Side or South Chicago;
No history of breast cancer; and
